snippet: Strasburg, 27, can opt out of the deal after the third or fourth seasons. But by signing now, he takes himself out of a thin class of free-agent starters.
abstract: Washington Nationals sign seven-year, $175 million contract with pitcher Stephen Strasburg.
lead_paragraph: Strasburg, 27, can opt out of the deal after the third or fourth seasons. But by signing now, he takes himself out of a thin class of free-agent starters.

headline.main: Nationals and Stephen Strasburg Agree to Seven-Year Deal
